title: Rikky and Pete = Rikky & Pete
creator_credit: Nadia Tass, David Parker and Cascade Films
brief_description: Rikky is a talented and would be singer and her brother, Pete, is a mechanical genius. After Pete pulls one practical joke too many, they escape Melbourne for an adventure in the outback eventually finding themselves amongst the characters of a mining town. Stars Stephen Kearney and Nina Landis with Bill Hunter, Bruno Lawrence and Bruce Spence in supporting roles.
